question: The Union Defence Minister has launched a Digital training application for which unit?
explanation:
A mobile training application for the National Cadet Corps (NCC) has been launched by the Defence Minister Rajnath Singh.
The application aims to conduct country wide online training to the NCC cadets. Since the schools and colleges have been closed on account of the COVID 19 pandemic, the app would enable the cadets to be trained through audio visual means.
